high_descs: Turn right and walk towards the living room then turn right against the wall to stand facing the sidetable.
Pick up the butterknife from the corner table.
Examine the stick in the desklamp light.
anns.task_desc: Find the ButterKnife and examine it in the DeskLamp light

high_descs: Turn around, head towards the sidetable at the other end.
Take the butterknife from the side table
anns.task_desc: Go to the side table and pick the ButterKnife

high_descs: Turn right go straight to the sidetable.
Take the butterknife from the table
Move the brush near to the desklamp.
anns.task_desc: Examine a ButterKnife by the light of a DeskLamp
